pynq.audio package¶

Submodules¶

pynq.audio.audio module¶

class pynq.audio.audio.Audio[source]¶

Bases: object

Class for the audio controller.

This class just sets the static _audio_ctrl variable if not yet set. The _audio_ctrl in LineIn and Headpone classes inherits from Audio.

_audio_ctrl¶

object – An audio control object from C-API.

class pynq.audio.audio.Headphone[source]¶

Bases: pynq.audio.audio.Audio

Class for the audio headphone (HPH) channel.

This is a child class of Audio.

controller¶

object – Uses the audio controller in its parent class (C-API).

class pynq.audio.audio.LineIn[source]¶

Bases: pynq.audio.audio.Audio

Class for the audio LineIn channel.

This is a child class of Audio.

controller¶

object – Uses the audio controller in its parent class (C-API).
